text: Ezɨ Jetro, Moses gumazamizibar akurvazir araziba, bar dar gara, egha kamaghɨn Moses mɨgei, “Maning, gua uaningra ingangarir avɨribar gumazamizibar akurvaghasa dagh ami. Nɨ uabɨra ingangarir kam damuan markɨ. Nɨ gan, nɨ osɨmtɨziba akɨra aperaghavɨra iti gumazamiziba mɨzaraghara iza nɨ ko mɨkɨmasa, nɨ mɨzua tuivighav ikia, ghua aruem gɨfa.”
